title: Initial autopsy points to sexual assault, murder of woman trainee doctor found in Kolkata Hospital
selftext: A second year post graduate trainee was raped and murdered while on duty in a premiere goverment medical college in Kolkata. Is this what we have descended to as a society?
comments: A sad of state of affairs for women in India.
Truly sickening if that’s what really happened

The college authorities are apparently trying to suppress the whole thing. As a doctor myself, this is disheartening. Is this the society I’m supposed to treat? Fucking thankless pigs. 
Please dont let this news die out guys. Spread the word.
Unlike other professions, hospitals have people who are doctors in the chain of command, why these people wh
Education doesnt make you a good person I guess.
